downloadTitle: AX 2012 R3 for Retail POS PAF-ECF 02.03 certification - Brazil
downloadDescription: ​This document describes the changes that have been made to Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 for Retail POS in the PAF-ECF operating mode for Brazil to meet the ne​w ER 02.03 specification.​
detailsSection:
​In Brazil, PAF-ECF operations are regulated by the “ATO COTEPE/ICMS 9” law. A new requirement version that is
named ER 02.03has been published. To comply with these requirements, Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 for Retail
POS had to complete the certification process, and some changes were required before the product could be made
available to Brazilian market.​
